title: Crypto Drop Wipes Out $370M in Bullish Bets as BTC, ETH Give Back Gains
contentSnippet: Binance, Hyperliquid, and Bybit were the most affected exchanges, comprising 72% of all forced unwinds.

title: Satoshi Nakamoto statue lands on NYSE in sign of changing times
contentSnippet: There are five other Satoshi statues made by Valentina Picozzi located around the world in Switzerland, El Salvador, Japan, Vietnam, and Miami, in the US State of Florida.

title: Gemini Gets CFTC Approval to Launch Prediction Markets in US
contentSnippet: The CFTC license will let Gemini offer event contracts in the U.S., joining Kalshi and Polymarket in a booming market.

title: 仮想通貨業界トップ、米CFTC新設諮問会議に参加へ
contentSnippet: 米CFTCが「CEOイノベーション評議会」を設立し、クラーケンやジェミナイなど仮想通貨業界トップが参加。デリバティブ市場の構造変化やトークン化について議論。仮想通貨担保のパイロットプログラムも開始。

title: Australian regulator eases rules for stablecoins and wrapped tokens
contentSnippet: Australia’s securities regulator has removed licensing requirements for stablecoin intermediaries and approved omnibus accounts, reducing compliance costs.

title: GOP hardliners vexed as defense bill advances without CBDC ban
contentSnippet: Conservatives in the Republican Party are frustrated that a promised ban on central bank digital currencies didn’t make it into a must-pass defense bill that’s now on its way to the Senate.

title: XRP Slides as Traders Take Bitcoin Profits, With ETF Flows Still Strong
contentSnippet: Institutional flows surged 54% above the weekly average, indicating strategic selling rather than retail panic.

title: レイヤーゼロ（ZRO）とは？スターゲートの使い方・バイバックの仕組みを解説
contentSnippet: レイヤーゼロ（LayerZero）の仕組みやZROトークンのバイバック、スターゲートを使ったブリッジ方法を初心者向けに解説。Stargate買収の背景やリスクまでわかりやすく紹介します。

title: Bhutan Launches Sovereign Gold-Backed Token on Solana
contentSnippet: The launch adds to Bhutan’s broader blockchain push, including Bitcoin reserves, Binance Pay integration and hydro-powered BTC mining.

title: A16z Crypto opens office in South Korea as it bets on Asia
contentSnippet: A16z Crypto has opened its first Asian office in Seoul, South Korea, led by former Polygon Labs executive SungMo Park, with the venture capital firm noting the region’s dominance in global adoption.

title: MSCI’s Bitcoin snub is like penalizing Chevron for oil: Strategy CEO
contentSnippet: The MSCI Index is consulting on whether to exclude Bitcoin and other digital asset treasury companies that have a balance sheet with more than 50% of their assets in crypto.

title: Why is Bitcoin Trading Lower Today?
contentSnippet: Market uncertainty persists due to internal Fed divisions and unclear future rate paths until 2026.

title: Bitcoin Traders Bet on 2026 Boom, Not a Santa Rally, Following Fed Rate Cut
contentSnippet: Bitcoin options traders are tempering expectations for a Santa rally and are now looking to $130,000 and $180,000 strikes in Q1, 2026.

title: CFTC Innovation Council adds prediction market, exchange CEOs
contentSnippet: The CFTC's new CEO Innovation Council includes leaders from crypto exchanges like Kraken and traditional stock exchanges such as Nasdaq to discuss market structure reforms.

title: U.S. Senate's Crypto Market Structure Bill Gets Messy as Calendar Weighs Down
contentSnippet: The White House has shut down proposals, and lawmakers are circulating the Democrats' asks in what had been a close negotiation, revealing 11th-hour pressure.

title: イーロンのスペースX、146億円相当のビットコイン移動　IPO関連か？
contentSnippet: イーロン・マスク氏率いるスペースXが約146億円相当のビットコインを移動した。10月から毎週大規模な送金を継続しており、IPO計画との関連が注目されている。

title: トム・リー氏、「イーサリアムは既に底打ち」　先週690億円相当を購入
contentSnippet: ビットマイン会長トム·リー氏が、イーサリアムは既に底入れしたと発言。同社は先週、約4億6,000万ドル相当のETHを購入し、10月以来最大規模の買い増しを実施。今後10~15年間、ビットコインよりもイーサリアムの将来性に期待を寄せている。

title: FRBの慎重姿勢でビットコイン反落　2026年の利下げは限定的か
contentSnippet: FRBは25bpの利下げを決定したが、パウエル議長の慎重姿勢を受けビットコインは下落した。2026年の追加利下げは1回との見方が広がる中、グラスノードのデータは実現損失が1日5.5億ドルとFTX崩壊時並みの高水準を示す。機関投資家の本格参入で4年サイクル終焉論も加速。

title: Payments giant Stripe acquires team from crypto wallet app Valora
contentSnippet: Stripe has hired Valora’s builders to work on its crypto initiatives, as the wallet’s app shifts ownership back to Celo’s cLabs.

title: Asia Morning Briefing: Fed Cut Brings Little Volatility as Bitcoin Waits for Japan
contentSnippet: CryptoQuant data shows seller exhaustion as whales pull back from exchanges, while traders prepare for a closely watched BOJ meeting that could influence global liquidity.

title: 米大手9行が仮想通貨企業を排除　通貨監督庁が是正へ
contentSnippet: 米通貨監督庁（OCC）は、JPモルガンなど大手9行が2020-23年に仮想通貨企業を含む合法事業者へのサービスを業種理由で制限していたと発表。「金融の武器化」と批判し、違法行為には司法省照会も検討。トランプ政権下で「デバンキング」問題の是正が加速。

title: ビットコイン9.4万ドル急騰からの反落、FOMC利下げ後に軟調な動き｜仮想NISHI
contentSnippet: FRBの25bp利下げを受け、ビットコインは一時9万4000ドルまで上昇したものの、その後反落。X-Bankアナリストの仮想NISHI氏によると、デリバティブ市場でのロング解消による売り圧力が現物買いを上回っている。欧米機関投資家のクリスマス休暇入りを控え、年末にかけて軟調基調となるリスクを指摘。

title: Bhutan Debuts TER Gold-Backed Token on Solana
contentSnippet: The Himalayan kingdom introduced TER, a Solana-based token backed by physical gold and issued through Gelephu Mindfulness City.

title: Hong Kong Cardinal Calls AI a 'Gift From God' as Asian Bishops Mull Ethical Challenges
contentSnippet: Regional church leaders met to establish guidelines for the use of AI in ministry, education, and content.

title: Gemini soars 14% as new license opens door to US prediction markets
contentSnippet: An affiliate of the crypto exchange Gemini received a designated contract market license, and it now plans to offer prediction markets in the US.

title: Crypto among sectors ‘debanked’ by 9 major banks: US regulator
contentSnippet: The Office of the Comptroller of the Currency said crypto was one of many industries that banks had denied services to, and it could refer its findings to the Justice Department.

title: ストラテジー社、ビットコイン保有企業の扱いめぐり書簡　MSCI指数除外案に反対表明
contentSnippet: ビットコインを蓄積するストラテジー社がMSCIの指数除外案に反対意見を提出。仮想通貨保有50%以上の企業を除外する提案に対して、様々な観点から異論を唱えている。

title: 上場企業がソラナ・ETH上で直接株式発行　Superstate新サービスを予定
contentSnippet: Superstateは、株式をトークン化する新サービスを発表。上場企業が仮想通貨イーサリアムやソラナのブロックチェーン上で株式を新たにトークン化して、投資家に直接発行することができる。

title: Survey finds 6 in 10 of Asia’s rich plan to ramp up crypto buying
contentSnippet: Sygnum’s APAC HNWI Report 2025 found that 87% of Asia’s high-net-worth individuals are already exposed to crypto, with an average allocation of approximately 17%.

title: Bitcoin Exchange Paxful Agrees to Plead Guilty, Hit With $7.5 Million in Penalties
contentSnippet: Authorities say Paxful was used by money launderers and other criminals—and that the Bitcoin exchange knew about it.

title: Official Trump Crypto Game Revealed With $1 Million in Solana Meme Coin Rewards
contentSnippet: Trump Billionaires Club on iOS and Android will launch by year's end and offer $1 million worth of the president's meme coin as rewards.

title: ビットコインの買い増しなどを計画　米Strive、最大約780億円を調達へ
contentSnippet: 米Striveは、最大約780億円相当の株式を発行・販売する契約を締結。調達資金は仮想通貨ビットコインの買い増しやビットコイン関連商品への投資などに使用すると説明した。

title: State Street and Galaxy to Launch Tokenized Liquidity Fund on Solana in 2026
contentSnippet: The fund will run on Solana at launch and use PYUSD.

title: Crypto CEOs Join U.S. CFTC's Innovation Council to Steer Market Developments
contentSnippet: The chief executives of firms such as Gemini and Kraken will pitch in on U.S. policy efforts through the council's future, public discussions.

title: Elon Musk's SpaceX Moves Bitcoin Ahead of Potential Record IPO
contentSnippet: Elon Musk's private aerospace company SpaceX moved more of its Bitcoin holdings on Wednesday ahead of reported blockbuster IPO plans.

title: Crypto Debanking and Efforts to 'Weaponize Finance' Must End, Says Top US Banking Regulator
contentSnippet: Major U.S. banks denied services to crypto and other lawful businesses based on industry rather than risk, an OCC preliminary report finds.

title: Stripe Acqui-Hires Crypto Payments Startup Valora, Venturing Further Into Stablecoins
contentSnippet: The team behind the Celo-based app is joining Stripe, while the intellectual property is returned to cLabs.

title: Tether Pivots to Wellness Apps and Robotics in Latest Step Away from Crypto
contentSnippet: The stablecoin giant is using its cash surplus to fund a disparate string of side ventures, from humanoid robots to calorie-counting AI.

title: A Startup Is Trying to Take the Twitter Name From Elon Musk by Force—And It Might Work
contentSnippet: Operation Bluebird, led by Twitter's former trademark lawyer, filed to cancel X Corp's Twitter trademarks after Musk abandoned the brand. Will Musk spend millions defending a name he deliberately kill

title: U.S. Banking Regulator Warns Wall Street on 'Debanking,' Claims Practices 'Unlawful'
contentSnippet: The Office of the Comptroller of the Currency probed debanking of certain industries, including digital assets, and said it'll pursue any repeat of such activity.
